a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Share of US land area with unusually high summer
Unusually hot summers are defined based on daily maximum temperatures. At each station, the recorded highs are compared with
the full set of historical records. After averaging over a particular month or season of interest, the warmest 10 percent of years are
Data source: National Oceanic & Atmospheric Administration (NOAA) via the US EPA
